oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph 01 of Charter Commission members, ca. 1962
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of Charter Commission members at work, circa 1962. Pictured here, from left to right, are Alexander Looby, Cecil Branstetter, Harlan Dodson, and Edward Hicks. These four men were appointed to both the first and second Charter Commissions. b & w; 35 mm.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Branstetter, Cecil; Dodson, Harlan; Hicks, Edward; Looby, Z. Alexander (Zephaniah Alexander);
